reviews.review: 單排自障隊友一堆小孬孬連一掛也沒有(紅紫段) 平常就蹲著慢慢走，沒有換掛觀念。最後一台，大家快不行，沒受傷也一直蹲不硬修，在那邊找退退?很多場本來有做事都可兩、三逃，變成四殺。突破三觀。 建議多排，有溝通有基本進度可以大增逃生率。
is fun sometimes
TOP

This game is very fun but there is only one problem. There are so many toxic and rude players. Sometimes it takes a long time to load but playing as a survivor or killer is very fun. The hit box is not the best.
اولاش باهاش حال نمیکردم اما الان پشمهایم فقط
so guud.

买了之后一直都是很平常地玩，操作起来了就溜屠夫，操作失误了就下饭，并没在杀鸡里找到什么特殊感觉。直到今天晚上这一局。普兰金街，皮脸，开局10秒一个队友倒了，直接拔线，剩下我和两个木村唯，我们仨呢就没闲着，该溜溜该修修该救救，4台后，皮脸开始死守剩下两台机，这两台机隔得很近（大门和房子旁边两台，估计走个6、7秒），我们三个人类根本没法修，就算我们不修机走一边去逛街皮脸也始终不离开那两台机。然后两个木村唯和我这个白妹就在旁边蹲蹲蹲贴贴贴，这时一个木村唯掏出一包紫钥匙。。。可我们三都不知道地窖在哪。然后皮脸不守了，过来找我们，三人就跑散了。我顺利在皮脸死守的大门旁的电机边找到地窖，然后顺利找到了木村唯A,跟她示意把钥匙给我跟我走，把她带到地窖之后，我没开，因为我想三人一起走，就和她一起去找唯B，可怎么怎么怎么都找不到，这时皮脸追我来了，我还是比较丝滑地溜了他几十秒，也倒地了，上树，皮脸死守还疯狂鞭尸，这时唯A过来在树下完美地卡了一波视野，皮脸因为唯B在远处射手电去追她，我此时竟然有了一丝邪恶的想法，要不放弃唯B直接叫唯A一起走了?我和唯B已经二挂了，再拖下去万一都走不了了，就在我这么想着，唯A救了我，让我没想到的是，她直接跑向了皮脸的方向，她还是坚持了最初的想法。我心情有点复杂，自摸好之后到了地窖旁，她们俩还没到，我就在旁边两棵树旁躲着，心里是干着急，假如倒一个我还去不去救？要不直接就走了？我一个人走好像也太不好吧，至少带一个啊喂毕竟钥匙都是别人的。。。可我还是想三人一起走啊！要是我一人走了这个夜晚就不完美了。她们没放弃我，我也不想辜负她们。就在此时！当我缓过神来，她们两就像奇迹一样，一前一后走到了地窖旁，我这会已经是根本没心思在想了，生怕耽搁一秒钟皮脸又来了，直接冲到她们面前，看了她们两眼，开了地窖，三人顺利出去了。这回已经十一点了，这一场打了我杀鸡前所未有的四十多分钟。我坐在椅子上感慨万分，谢谢两个木村唯让我感受到了游戏里的温度，虽然互不认识，而且也仅仅是在虚拟世界，这种不放弃伙伴的感觉真的让人心里很温暖，我的这个夜晚完美了，希望你们的这个夜晚也完美了。PS：应该多贴下再走的，毕竟当时连心跳都还没听到呢哈哈哈，两位的ID一个是MAKE ME FEEL ALIVE，一个是AWIEARROW。我发送了好友邀请，看到的话通过下吧。祝好。

Great game. Fun to play by yourself or with friends, for the most part incredibly casual and can either play it a couple times every now and then or sit down and grind it for days on end. If you can't afford the DLC characters you can still get their perks via the store with in game currency sometimes.

Updating review due to sale: This game is as much fun as a baseball bat to the groin. It's like having a tumour removed from the same area, but without the possibility of enjoyment. It takes the simple concept of "hide and seek for adults" and turns it into "adults behaving like angry teenage virgins with genital acne". This game survives because it has literally no competition whatsoever - play as slasher / horror movie monsters and get tea bagged by people who smell like stale sweat, sadness and personal lubricant. Or team up with friends and immediately get face-sat and hard focused ("tunnelled") into oblivion because you're being pitted against people with thousands of hours of experience being antisocial in this absolute crapfest of a mouldy stained mattress quality game.

Save your money, save your time, save your energy - decline this game if it's gifted to you. Add "Dead by Daylight" to your list of blocked terms, literally everywhere. Yes, it's that bad.

Go out and buy something less annoying and useless instead -- like a limited edition vinyl pressing of fingernails scratching a chalkboard, or a local microbrewery's attempt at creating the perfect donkey urine IPA. Or streamer farts in a jar.

Original review follows:

Ever wanted to find out how much you hate yourself? Like truly and vehemently loathe, despise and detest yourself? Then step right up and invest your time, energy and money on this toxic, grindy, poorly-executed imitation of a game.

It's full trash. The community? Toxic trash. The developers? Clueless trash. Actual literal trash? Somehow less trash than this.

It would be hard to intentionally create a more flawed and incompetently handled product, but they did it with their follow-up game (which failed because they didn't spend any money on licensing popular characters with established fan bases to compensate for their total lack of common sense, intelligence and originality).

Your time is yours to waste, so join the legions of sweaty mountain dew-chugging neckbeards with their cheeto crumb encrusted console controllers and support this half-assed buggy stupidity right away!

Disclaimer: Game may be less entertaining than this review suggests.

They buff and debuff stuff all the time. Hit boxes have needed fixed for a while now. They are more concerned with cosmetics than fixing things. They have personally said that game breaking ways of playing are "tactics"... partially because they suck at there own game... for real you can look up videos. 신박한 게임 만들어 놓고 운영을 엿 같이 했다. 신규 유저라면 살인마로는 1사람 거는 것조차 힘들고 1사람 죽이는 것은 거의 불가능이다. 도대체 뭘 하면 3분 동안 뺑뺑이로 한 사람만 추적해도 어떻게 사람이 더 빠를 수가 있냐? 벽에 딱 붙어서 가는데. 핵 있다던데 핵 아니냐 이 정도면? 게다가 처음에 캐릭터를 만들었을 때 아이템을 가지고 있다는 게 불가능한데 그것에 대한 보정도 없다. 시간, 랭킹, 아이템 그 어떠한 보정도 없이 야생에 내몰려진다. 솔직히 말해서 4명이 아니라 생존자 3명이어도 1사람 잡을 수 있냐고 한다면 그것도 가능하다고 말하기 힘들다.

탈출성공하든 못하든 살인마로부터 도망치고 숨고 추격전을 하면서 느껴지는 쫄깃함과 스릴이 너무 중독적이라.. 1000시간 순삭.. 
진짜 너무 재밌다구요.. ㅜ
I generally love this game.
legal
the best

优点：（大概是优点吧）单说游戏内容还是不错的，我是17年的时候知道这个游戏的，偶尔上优酷看看视频，慢慢的B站也有了，不过画面是绿的，就硬看，一直是云玩家。之后看付导，怀叔，巨色······他们的视频入了坑，买了游戏。玩了几把才知道什么叫一看就会，一试就废。由于自己过菜的技术，我一怒之下就把他扔去仓库里积灰了。不过视频一直在看，官方的动态也一直在点赞转发。这几年下来，也算是看着杀鸡在成长，各大漫展也出现了原创角色的cos，玩家也渐渐增多。一步步的在向前走。我也真心希望杀鸡能越做越好，多看看玩家的建议与意见。

这段时间是有朋友一起打，才把它下回来。
———————转折来了————————
难得把段位打上来了，可是这个月貌似又是个什么新bug，有些玩家段位重置了几次，有些完全没管。很不幸，我和我朋友就是那
些没重置的，我本来还美滋滋的想又可以赚血点了。结果······现实总是残酷的。之后就更离谱了（详见下方“错误代码”）

精分评论预警！！！
缺点：BUG！真就修好了一个，瞬间多出一堆。游戏内的动作交互bug，我暂时还没遇到过。
但是你这个服务器能不能做好点，你比人家育碧的服务器还要土豆！关于这个错误代码，我宁愿是“发生未知错误”，因为这种情况血点照样给你，段位也是正常加减。
错误代码，血点你不给就算了，比赛内明明升了，一个错误代码把我踹出来之后直接掉豆。而且，好家伙，你们这代码完全不重复啊，搁着做数学题是吧，给你三个数字看看能组出多少个三位数。请问你给我这一串代码有啥用，我是能找后台解决还是让我集齐多少个找官方兑奖。
希望制作组能解决这些问题吧。把这些bug排开，游戏还是挺耐玩的（文档库点赞）。

One of the worst game I've ever played.

- Unbalanced
- Toxic community
- People abusing broken gameplay mechanic
- Random survivors players are more a threat than the killer himself (no, they aren't stupid; They are doing it on purpose coz no one is THAT dumb)
- Horrible netcode and validation is done on the killer's computer
- Game is very unfriendly to new player and you'll have to farm quite a bit top unlock necessary 'skills/perks' to survive
- There are like 4 maps in the game with some variation (snow, night, ...)
- Still waiting for the devs to fix their broken game ... every new patch bring some new broken stuff *enjoy*

I'll really recommend to play with some friends otherwise you will loose a part of your soul. 
But even if you play with some of your mates be ready to loose faith in humanity after a couple of hours playing this game unless you are a 4 members team.

Okay so based on solo queuing as a survivor it is very tough to win and beat the killer successfully. Simply because you and your team don't have comms. But if your team does have comms it can tilt the scale substantially in the survivors favour. 

I would say play solo queue to work on skills and interactions with the killer, because they happen so frequently. Team queue if you want to play more strategically/ have more fun playing cat and mouse with friends. Also will increase your chances of winning quite a bit. 

I don't have anyone to team queue with out of my friends, so i have been getting fruitfully enraged in solo queue. But the game is good and fun just gotta know how the scales work.
